Woke up this morning planning to do my taxes.
Ended up building a rip-roaring colony on Mars instead.
Mars colony ran out of money and everyone died.
Still haven't done my taxes.
10/10

First Impression Gameplay:

Found a breakthrough positronic brain technology. I set up biorobots, drove them into one dome. DISCONNECTED OXYGEN FOR PEOPLE! For a hundred years now, the colony of biorobots on Mars, the little people on Earth have not yet suspected of anything ...

32 prisoners have serious complaints

10/10
I raided a Prisoner's cell and found thirty spoons, he wasn't even tunneling, just had a collection going.
I found a spoon in an inmates cell and I called the swat team in and they killed half the prison.
It's like SimCity, but your Sims stab each other.
I found a spoon in an inmates cell and I called the swat team in and they killed half the prison.

-Prisoner got a spoon
-Killed two guards with that very spoon
-tried to call in riot guards
-two died
-got it under control
Find out later that he was angry over missing breakfast

10/10 would have a spoon riot again

2021 Update:
I do not suggest buying this game in its current state.
Game now unplayable for me and many others due to game breaking bugs - such a shame.
I will update this once it is playable again.

Hey EA, look at how much fun I'm having not playing your games!

One of my residents started spouting some bourgeois ♥♥♥♥ about our region's farming industry via the in-game Twitter feed.

Fortunately, the game was able to immediately show me their whereabouts so I bulldozed their ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥ home and built a cow pasture on it.

Five stars.
